DocumentTypeImpl We don't support DTDs yet - every method returns null.

NotationImpl  
Page Page data describe a sequence of SAX events, using three parallel arrays: an array of bytes, describing the type of each event, an array of (pointers to) String objects, and an array of pointers to each event's next sibling.
ProcessingInstructionImpl  
SAXDOMIO Reading and writing SAXDOM documents in a binary format.
SAXDOMReader Read SAXDOM documents in a binary format.
SAXDOMWriter Writing SAXDOM documents in a pre-parsed, binary format.
SAXEvent Constants for SAX events
TextImpl  
 

Exception Summary
InsufficientMemoryException BufferManager preallocates and maintains an array of pages of SAX events, and manages their translation into DOM events.
